title: PupVenture
summary: This app provides users with a list of dog-friendly destinations. The user inputs the date and a location and will see nearby destinations and the weather forecast for that date. Additionally, the user can save locations as favourites.

title: Team Profile Generator
summary: This command-line application generates a profile of software development team members based on user input. The user input is gathered using Inquirer and objects are created for each team member using the relevant classes.

title: README Generator
summary: This command-line application generates a professional README file based on the user's input.

title: Weather Dashboard
summary: This weather dashboard runs in the browser to display user-defined data retrieved from Open Weather Map (https://openweathermap.org/) and day.js.  Local storage is used for favourites to persist when the page is reloaded.

title: Work Day Scheduler
summary: This calendar application allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.  The current day and date is taken from day.js and is displayed in a user-friendly format.

title: Code Quiz
summary: This app provides a multiple-choice quiz on the topic of coding that runs in the browser, powered by JavaScript.
